original_title: No trains for three days on Matale-Kandy line
original_body_lines: The Railways Department today announced the temporary closure of the railway line between Kandy and Katugastota for three days on the Matale-Kandy railway line.
They said the railway line will be closed for required repairs and will be closed from midnight on August 18 till 04 p.m. on August 21.
